content.question: One stated objective of Woodrow Wilson’s plan for peace after the First World War was to

choices.label: ensure the military dominance of the United States over the European powers
ensure that the Central Powers paid the Allied nations for war damages
destroy the Central Powers’ military strength
promote the right of national self-determination
provide monetary assistance to rebuild Europe

content.answer: promote the right of national self-determination

topic.text: 7.5: World War I - Military and Diplomacy

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
